Summary: Hugh bright slow moving light in the sky. Round in shape.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas watching fireworks with neighbors and saw a big bright light in the sky moving very slowly. north east of las vegas. And then it just very slowly disappeared. And I know it was not the ISS. Which I have seen many times. Very strange. What ever it was it was not a plane or a meteor. Very strange. Right around 9:pm our time.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were 2 other sightings in Las Vegas on or around July 4th 2012
